snippets.title: DNA Sequence Complement
snippets.description: Generate the complement of a DNA sequence
snippets.author: BioCoder

snippets.title: Calculate GC Content
snippets.description: Calculate the GC content percentage of a DNA sequence
snippets.code:
def gc_content(dna_sequence):
    sequence = dna_sequence.upper()
    gc_count = sequence.count('G') + sequence.count('C')
    total_count = len(sequence)
    return (gc_count / total_count) * 100 if total_count > 0 else 0

# Example usage
seq = "ATCGATCGATCG"
gc_percent = gc_content(seq)
print(f"Sequence: {seq}")
print(f"GC Content: {gc_percent:.2f}%")
snippets.author: BioCoder

snippets.title: FASTA Parser
snippets.description: Parse FASTA format sequences from a file or string
snippets.example_output:
seq1 Description 1: ATCGATCGATCGTAGCTAGC
seq2 Description 2: GCGCGCGC

snippets.title: Count unique variants in VCF
snippets.description: Count unique variants in a VCF file
snippets.code: cat *.vcf | grep -v '^#' | awk '{print $1 "\t" $2 "\t" $5}' | sort | uniq -d | wc -l
snippets.author: BioCoder

snippets.title: Count mapped reads in BAM
snippets.description: Count the number of mapped reads in a BAM file
snippets.code: samtools view -F 4 in.bam | cut -f 1 | awk '!x[$0]++' | wc -l
snippets.author: BioCoder

snippets.title: Count mapped reads in BAM (paired-end)
snippets.description: Count the number of mapped reads in a BAM file for paired-end reads
snippets.code: samtools view -F 12 in.bam | cut -f 1 | awk '!x[$0]++' | wc -l
snippets.author: BioCoder

snippets.title: Subsample paired FASTQ files
snippets.description: Subsample 10000 read pairs from two large paired FASTQ files with same random seed
snippets.code:
seqtk sample -s100 read1.fq 10000 > sub1.fq
seqtk sample -s100 read2.fq 10000 > sub2.fq
snippets.example_output:
Created sub1.fq with 10000 reads
Created sub2.fq with 10000 reads
